abstract: H. Melvin Ming will replace Gary Knell, who on Sunday was named the new head of NPR.
snippet: H. Melvin Ming will replace Gary Knell, who on Sunday was named the new head of NPR.
lead_paragraph: 10:28 a.m. | Updated Sesame Workshop, the nonprofit group that produces "Sesame Street" and other educational media for children, said Monday that it had named H. Melvin Ming its chief executive, replacing Gary E. Knell, who was named the chief executive of NPR on Sunday.
